response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds significant value to us and is tailored to meet your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering this exclusive item to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This opportunity is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to share our product with someone who appreciates its true worth. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 9500}
